message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was hoping to find a price closer to my budget. Could we possibly agree on $150 for the product?
I understand that $150 is a bit tight for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $165 for the product.
Thanks for considering my budget, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $145 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your willingness to sell.
I'm still not comfortable with $145, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $160 for the product. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a final offer of $155 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise.

I've made a few concessions already, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I can see that you're close to your budget, so I'm willing to meet you at $157.50 for the product. That's the lowest I can go.
